original_title: นักฆ่าไร้เงา
overview: Storm (Typhoon Kanokchat Manyaon), a young police officer who resigned from the agency. and immersed himself in the past mistakes One night, he receives a message from his former commander to return to work for the nation in a secret unit known as the "Black Pigeon", but the caveat is that he must become an anonymous person who no longer exists.
title: Invisible Cop
